description: Short code indicating an assetâ€™s lifecycle state used in workflows and reporting.
Human-readable label for the status code shown in UIs and reports.
Indicates the status definition is deprecated and should no longer be assigned to assets; retained for historical records.
Unique identifier for the status record, used as a stable key in references and integrations.
Indicates whether maintenance work orders or related documents may be created or accessed when an asset is in this status.
Flags status definitions delivered by the application as defaults rather than custom entries; may be restricted from modification.
